H1.text: when is the fa cup semi-finals being played. Tottenham Hotspur Stadium

H3.text: when is the fa cup semi-finals being played. Wembley Stadium

A4.text: The semi-finals have been played exclusively at the rebuilt Wembley Stadium since 2008, one year after it opened and after it had already hosted a final (in 2007).
